source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT oslLocationID,
oslAccountNo,
oslShipTo,
oslLocationName,
oslAddress1,
oslAddress2,
oslCity,
oslState,
oslZip,
oslCountry,
oslCounty,
oslPrimaryPhone,
oslPrimaryFax,
oslPrimaryEmail,
oslLatitude,
oslLongitude,
oslLocationStatus,
oslLocationStatusNotes,
oslLegacyLocationID,
oslWhseShipTo,
oslProspectID,
oslOwnerType,
oslLta,
oslDMA,
oslMSA,
oslCountyFips,
oslMarketZone,
oslOpAreaZone,
oslCurrency,
oslLanguage,
oslTimeZone,
oslGeographicZone,
oslStatus,
oslStatusNotes,
oslLocationType,
oslSoftOpenDate,
oslGrandOpenDate,
oslClosed,
oslClosedDate,
oslClosedAuthorization,
oslRelocated,
oslRelocationCloseDate,
oslRelocationOpenDate,
oslRelocationNotes,
oslAcquisition,
oslAcquisitionDate,
oslAcquisitionNotes,
oslPreOpenComments,
oslTUAID,
oslTUADate,
oslTUAExpireDate,
oslTUATerm,
oslTUADateComplete,
oslTurnoverDate,
oslRecordChangesFlag,
oslOperationsIntroDate,
oslMsPipelineDate,
oslLicenseeID,
usra,
dtea,
usrc,
dtec,
oslAddress3,
oslStoreRefresh,
oslStoreRefreshDate,
oslStoreRefreshNotes,
oslmPlansSubToDesign,
oslmPRMeeting,
oslmPlansSentToOwnerLic,
oslURLRegistration,
oslEnterpriseStoreNumber FROM [EDME_DataFactory].OSLocation WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT osOneSourceID,
osOneSourceName,
osLegacyLocationID,
osLegacyStoreID,
osProfitCenter,
osChannel,
osActive,
osStoreType,
osSource,
osLocationID,
osStartDate,
osEndDate,
usra,
dtea,
usrc,
dtec,
osProfitCenterType,
osProfitCenterStatus FROM [EDME_DataFactory].OSOneSource WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT oslLicenseeID,
oslStoreType,
oslLicenseeNotes,
oslPrimaryCountry,
oslStatus,
oslActive,
oslActiveDate,
oslActiveNotes,
oslGuarantors,
oslMailingAddress1,
oslMailingAddress2,
oslMailingCity,
oslMailingState,
oslMailingZip,
oslMailingCountry,
oslLegalEntityName,
oslLegalEntityAddress1,
oslLegalEntityAddress2,
oslLegalEntityCity,
oslLegalEntityState,
oslLegalEntityZip,
oslLegalEntityCountry,
usra,
dtea,
usrc,
detc,
oslLicensedTerritory,
oslDisclosureDocument,
oslMailingAdd FROM [EDME_DataFactory].OSLicensee WITH(NOLOCK)
